name: Lorraine's Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1 pound braising steak, cut in strips (chuck or round steak will do)

instructions.en: In a large skillet, brown the meat in butter.
Add the onion; cook a couple minutes until they start to brown.
Add garlic and mushrooms; season with salt and pepper. Cook about 3 minutes.
Dissolve the bouillon cube in the boiling water; stir into the meat.
Bring to a boil, then transfer to a large covered casserole.
Bake at 325Â°F, covered, for 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Stir and check every 30 minutes to see if meat is tender.
Stir in the marjoram and sour cream. Do not boil.
Stir in the parsley, if using.

notes: This recipe makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. Can be served over Faux Rice.
